channel.description: Recent content in Food on Yﾄ》rﾄ［aya

item.title: Volunteering for Food
item.description: “Why we chose Bunda, or should I say, why Bunda chose us?” our host Aysha spoke of her reason for choosing to make this sleepy village her home. I sat in front of her nervously, hoping that the voice was clearly recording and we would complete the interview in a single take. She was dressed up for the interview, had rehearsed the questions, but we chose to keep the interview itself spontaneous, impromptu and she was eager to get it right.

item.title: No one can stop looking at Jardin
item.description: I have many a times sifted through my memories to focus on the colourful postcards in my mind’s eye that for me represent Jardin, and I have wondered, what was it that I did there for a couple of days? As simple as it might sound, nothing really. Absolutely nothing if I were to be accurate. Yes. If there is a really good venue for doing nothing, then it had to be Jardin.
